translation.Chi siamo testo: We are the creators of Word Impostor, a game that tests your intuition and bluffing skills. Our goal? To create a fun and engaging experience for everyone, from friends looking for a quick challenge to families wanting to liven up their evenings. In this game, communication is key: every word can reveal or confuse. We’re passionate about games that bring people together, and with Word Impostor, we aim to provide a simple, intuitive, and, most importantly, entertaining platform. Get ready to find out who’s great at lying... or uncovering the truth!
